font-size:14; font-family:微软雅黑; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#000000

item.answer:
【考法 1】 adj. 勇敢的： having a stout heart or spirit
【例】 a stouthearted army officer who risked his life to save his men 为了拯救部下宁愿牺牲自己的勇敢军官
【近】 bold, brave, courageous, dauntless, fearless, gallant, intrepid, stalwart, stout, valiant, valorous
【反】 cowardly, craven, fearful, gutless, nerveless, pusillanimous, spineless, spiritless, timorous 怯懦的

【记】 stout（adj.结实的；勇敢坚定的；矮胖的），heart，ed－勇敢的心
